ComicInfo.Summary: The Fiend possesses Doug Herman, a weak-willed nobody that possesses some hatred for Dragon. The Police try to enlist The Mace into the Police Force, who is also sought by The Vicious Circle.

ComicInfo.Title: To Fight the Fiend
